name: Toxic Warfare VR
description:
Toxic Warfare VR game was made within 48 hours at google #BerlinXRJam2017.

You are a future hunter fighting with dinosaur birds in the toxic jungle. You intoxicated by acid coral fumes and cannot focus. Your blaster is melting and laser whip dont behave as you expect. Try to touch soft rifle on the ground - it's your last chance. 

---------------

Works with Oculus and Vive. Left trigger to shoot. Gon make sounds laters. 

Follow me on https://twitter.com/vladstorm_
